Model.Collision

Class Collision

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.Collision.Collision

  • public class Collision
extends java.lang.Object
    Collision methods between board, ball, bricks, and pads.

    • Method Detail

      • getCircleDeflectionAngle

        public double getCircleDeflectionAngle(double circleX1,
                                       double circleY1,
                                       double circleX2,
                                       double circleY2)
        Get the deflection angle between two circles
        Parameters:
        circleX1 - center X position of first circle.
        circleY1 - center Y position of first circle.
        circleX2 - center X position of second circle.
        circleY2 - center Y position of second circle.
        Returns:
        angle of deflection between closest points of both circles.

      • getRectangleDeflectionAngle

        public double getRectangleDeflectionAngle(float pX,
                                          float pY,
                                          float recX,
                                          float recY,
                                          float recW,
                                          float recH)
        Get the deflection angle between a point and a rectangle.
        Parameters:
        pX - X position of a point.
        pY - Y position of a point.
        recX - rectangle's center X position.
        recY - rectangle's center Y position.
        recW - width of the rectangle.
        recH - height of the rectangle.
        Returns:
        angle of deflection between point and edge of the rectangle.

      • isBallOutsideBoard

        public boolean isBallOutsideBoard(Board board,
                                  Ball ball)
        Return true if the ball is outside the board radius.
        Parameters:
        board - the board ball must stay within.
        ball - the ball to check against the board.
        Returns:
        true if ball is outside board's circle radius.

      • isPLayerPadHit

        public boolean isPLayerPadHit(Board board,
                              Pad pad,
                              Ball ball)
        Check if player pad hit by the ball.
        Parameters:
        board - the board the pad and ball belongs too.
        pad - the pad to check.
        ball - the ball to check.
        Returns:
        true if the ball are in colliding with the ball.

      • estimateBallCollision

        public double estimateBallCollision(Ball ball,
                                    java.lang.Iterable<Ball> balls)
        Estimate the time (movement units) until balls collide.
        Parameters:
        ball - the ball to check.
        balls - iterable set of balls to check ball against.
        Returns:
        time (movement units) until next estimated collision.

      • estimateBallCollision

        public double estimateBallCollision(Ball ball,
                                    Ball otherBall)
        Estimate the time (movement units) until two balls collide.
        Parameters:
        ball - the ball to check collision for.
        otherBall - the other ball to check against.
        Returns:
        estimated time for collision. NaN if no collision.

      • estimateBrickCollision

        public double estimateBrickCollision(Ball ball,
                                     java.lang.Iterable<Brick> bricks)
        Find shortest time (movement units) until a ball collide with bricks.
        Parameters:
        ball - the ball to check against.
        bricks - iterable collection of bricks.
        Returns:
        the shortest time until next collision. NaN if no collision.

      • estimateBrickCollision

                                     Brick brick)

        Parameters:
        ball - the ball to check collision for.
        brick - the brick to check against.
        Returns:
        estimated time for collision. NaN if no collision.

      • estimatePlayerCollision

        public double estimatePlayerCollision(Ball ball,
                                      java.lang.Iterable<Player> players)
        Find shortest time until a ball collide with a player pad.
        Parameters:
        ball - the ball to check against.
        players - iterable collection of players (and their pads).
        Returns:
        the shortest time until next collision. NaN if no collision.

      • estimatePlayerCollision

        public double estimatePlayerCollision(Ball ball,
                                      Player player)
        Find shortest time until a ball collide with player pad.
        Parameters:
        ball - the ball to check against.
        player - the player (and related pad) to check against.
        Returns:
        the shortest time until next collision. NaN if no collision.

      • estimateBallGone

        public double estimateBallGone(Board board,
                               Ball ball)
        Estimate time (movement units) until ball is outside the board.
        Parameters:
        board - the board to check against.
        ball - the ball to check distance on.
        Returns:
        true if ball is outside board radius.
